column4: hi, I downloaded Desktop UBUNTU. And booted through it.  But at I finally end with a blank orange color screen (where Gnome or KDE session start from).  But I do not get system hang, but just seems to be nothing running from there.  What is wrong?
Is the alternate cd  like a Live CD or just an installation cD?
great. thank you.  I shall try now.
it is text based installer cd which does not act like live cd
